_sText:
/!\  cs_island_B2 is a BETA version, the final one is available now.

Island - Hostage Rescue

The original to_Eskero was made by Cormac "Poneil" Donnelly for TacticalOps.
The layout allows an extremely pleasant and balanced game play.
This new version carries the old one into Counter-Strike : Source with many fresh features, as a new way to take hostages and save them.
The whole map has been redesigned to benefit by the power of Source engine :
Ambient sounds, Breakable lights...

The story :
Events take place on a little island with a lighthouse during a thunder storm.
The lighthouse keepers were kidnapped by terrorists in order to be in control of the area around the island.
Thus the government decided to send elite troupes to release hostages and suppress the threat.

Other Notes : There are 3 hostages in
this mission.

Credits :

Map/Textures :
Gabriel Thibaud (glloq69@free.fr) Web Site:http://glloq69.free.fr/mapping
Original map : to_eskero by Cormac "Poneil" Donnelly

This released is a beta version, so there are some issues remaining, although any important one. I reckon that I will not released a final version soon for this version works fine.

IMPORTANT : The .nav is included in the .bsp file, don't generate your own .nav file, it will not work due to the hostages' position.

I hope you will enjoy it!
